column5: Here is observation from Memorial Day W/E.Kenora region weather excellent with days up into 60's +Expect warming of lake over next few days/week.South of Kenora on LOTW Walleye in 15 to 25' ( More toward 25') scattered and moving slow. Extremely slow fishing leeches expect gentle pick ups. N. Pike in western Witch Bay running smaller than expected but water level in LOTW is down approx 1 meter. Temps vary upward in shallower areas to 57 deg F. N. Pikes hitting on copper spoons ( with trailer enhancements such as a red twister etc. ) and blue/white jointed Rapalas etc. More info on request from me at [email protected]Good Luck
